text: == Events == * John Shore invents the tuning fork. * Alexander Pope publishes An Essay on Criticism. == Births == * April 26 - David Hume, Scottish philosopher (d. 1776) * September 11 - William Boyce, English composer * October 15 - Elisabeth Therese of Lorraine, Queen of Sardinia * December 11 - BÃ¡rbara of Portugal, Portuguese princess ==Deaths== * April 14 - Louis, le Grand Dauphin, son of Louis XIV of France (b. 1661)
